about_the_game:
RECORD_DrowsyVortex is a comprehensive project with games as the core medium. This work experimentally combines book design, game design, etc. to reconstruct a piece of history under the background of the Space Immigration Era from different perspectives.

Game Introduction

The game of RECORD_DrowsyVortex is a post-apocalyptic exploration-focused RPG set in the future era of Space Immigration. It is one piece of recorded data transmitted from Planet Drowsy Vortex centuries later, through which the players will be able to immersively experience a local post-disaster survivor's weird and memorable story.

A time when everyone relies on space suits, seemingly ordinary daily life, suddenly appeared anomalies, and gradually collapsing cognition (or reality?)... To get everything settled, join this adventure to seek the truth!

IMPORTANT NOTES

This game was developed with RPG Maker MZ, therefore the Steam screenshot function cannot be directly activated by F12. If this function is needed, please copy the following code:

--in-process-gpu

And paste it into Library > RECORD_DrowsyVortex > Manage > Properties... > Launch Options (as shown in the picture) Then screenshots can be taken with F12.

[Note: Some devices may experience a black screen when loading some scenes of the final stage. Please try closing the game and relaunching it, or removing the "--in-process-gpu" in Launch Options and then relaunching it.]

Features

  • The survival and psychological states of natural disaster survivors.

  • All human-shaped characters have either masked or object-headed images, or both.

  • Deal with a Lovecraftian creature.

  • Detailed map and book content designs.

  • Explore the hidden plot behind the story while taking daily tasks.

  • Experience a short weirdcore-style journey in another space in the form of text adventure.

  • Simple battle process - The ultimate goal is to survive, reach the destination, and find the last truth!

Story Overview

The story begins on a Space Immigrants planet that has experienced a devastating natural disaster, named Drowsy Vortex. As one of the survivors, the protagonist voluntarily became an investigator on the only remaining land, but whose daily life was immersed in finding investigation commissions and running errands. Although the living environment was not what it used to be, the survivors could still live in peace with mutual support.

One day, a huge and abnormal creature suddenly appeared on this very last land of the planet, disrupting the increasingly peaceful post-disaster life.

As people gradually accepted its harmlessness and began to get used to its existence, more weird situations beyond recognition have quietly penetrated into the protagonist's life... What truths are still hidden on the lost Drowsy Vortex?

highlighted.name: A Day in the Life of an Investigator

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains:
1. Description of the depressed or distorted mental state that occurs when sanity collapses
2. Suggestions and displays of psychological horror and body horror
3. Simple depictions of violence during battle and expressions of pain 
4. Mildly rude content in language

Please be aware of these contents before deciding to play!

reviews:
“The gameplay is diverse, including not only area exploration, but also rule-based creepypasta, battle, and other elements. Maybe the plot and gameplay were both too peaceful in the early stages, which led me to think that this was a very calm game. I was deeply shocked when the style suddenly changed from sci-fi to weirdcore close to real life in the later stages.”
8.0/10 – 傻鲨
